reviews.review: As someone with a kind of wide foot , I really wanted this shoe to fit because I love the look ! Reebok is a go - to brand for me because their shoes often fit my wide feet well in a way other brands don ' t . However , this shoe is a lot narrower than Reebok ' s other offerings , so I wouldn ' t recommend it if you have wide feet . But it is a very cute shoe so I recommend it otherwise !
